full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RI BO DGE RGYAS DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DANG, DGE GSOL GLING GI GNAS BDAG BOG TO HA KANG AA KVO LAR GRAGS PA'I YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD BDE SKYID NYI MA'I 'OD SNANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @0014B (KHU RE CHEN PO RI BO DGE RGYAS DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DANG, DGE GSOL GLING GI GNAS BDAG HA KANG AA GRO LAR GRAGS PA 'DI NYID LA YUL 'DI'I MI RNAMS KYIS ^JING GER RGYAL PO'I RIGS KYI BSRUNG MA PO LHA DUNG SKYONG DKAR PO YIN GZHIR BZHAG BYAS YOD MOD, HA KANG AA KVA LAR 'DI LA DUNG SKYONG DKAR PO ZHIS BYA BA'I MING 'DOD RGYAL DU BTAGS NA DER ZAD MOD, ^NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN GYIS GSOL MCHOD BRTZAMS PA'I PO LHA DUNG SKYONG DKAR PO CHO CHEN ZHE DKU'I SA CHAR @0015A *, ,GNAS PA'I RI CHEN ZHIG YIN PAR GRAGS LA, GSOL MCHOD BSKUL BA PO'I AU TZU MU CHEN GYI DBON PO ZHIG YIN PAS NA, DUNG SKYONG DKAR PO BYA BA GNAS BDAG 'DI NYID YIN MIN THE TSOM GYI GZHIR CHES PAS, GSOL MCHOD 'DI NYID DU HA KANG AA KVA LAR RANG MING GIS BRIS PA YIN NO, ,SMRAS PA, SANGS RGYAS STONG GI CHOS 'KHOR SPRUL BA'I SKUS, ,BSKONG BA'I BSKUL MA TSANGS PAS MDZAD PAS NA, ,BYA RGOD PHUNG PO'I RI YI KHRI THOG TU, ,SA PA'I NYI MA'I 'OD SNANG 'DI 'DRA SHAR, ,DGE BAS YUL LHA DGYES 'GYUR ZHING, ,'JIG RTEN BDE ZHING LO LEGS 'GYUR, ,SRID PA DMAN PAi DPAL 'BYOR GYIS, ,ZHI BA'I DAM CHOS RGYAS GYUR CIG, ,BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA'I SKYES MCHOG JI SNYED KUN, ,MCHOG GSUM KHO NAR BLO GTANG SKYABS 'GRO YIS, ,SANGS RGYAS PA YI KHRI RU BRTAN BZHUGS NAS, ,'JIG RTEN LHA 'DRE'I SKYABS SU 'GYUR BAR SHOG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG, ,,)
